snippet.title: Hishouzame Flying Shark Sharp X68000 60fps Score:179960
snippet.description:
Hishouzame Flying Shark(Sky Shark) is the quintessential Toaplan vertical scrolling shooter, VERY hard and if you do a single mistake in a later stage, it's quite impossible to recover, as shown here.
Having said that, this Sharp X68000 port seems even harder than the arcade original, and is not a perfect port: bomb flame effect has too much slowdown and flicker, bosses and minibosses don't flick in white signaling they're taking damage, among other things. But it's quite good compared to other ports.
